channel.title: [Help] ::kick name reason [HELP]

item.title: [Help] ::kick name reason [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I need help how do i make like this ::kick playername reason ? and i need some kind of if player offline or wrong name is says and error.? help

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights > 1) { client player = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){ if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){ player = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i]; player.disconnected = true; player.logoutButton = true; yell("[Notice]"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" Has been kicked. Reason: "); } } } }

Read full topic
